QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Moth of Wrath
QuestData.Description: Deep in the forests of Nagrand are some beasts capable of evading almost any predator. The greatest of them all, the Moth of Wrath, is coated with a foul-smelling dust.$B$BIf the moth dust is enough to keep wolves at bay, it'll probably be a pretty good test for your clefthoof. See if you can't keep it focused and take down that moth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Moth of Wrath while riding your Clefthoof-In-Training.
